data.title: Best Movies Like Mad Love
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Mad Love: Keith (2008), Endless Love (1981), My First Time (2012), It's Kind of a Funny Story (2010), Mr. Jones (1993), Splendor in the Grass (1961), Endless Love (2014), Say Anything... (1989), For Keeps? (1988), 50 First Dates (2004)

Genre: Comedy, Drama, Romance

Country: USA

Duration: 93 min.

Story: Matt falls for Casey, the new girl in school. She's fun-loving and eccentric, but there's a darkness to her whimsy that Matt can't begin to comprehend. When Casey attempts to commit suicide, her parents place her in a mental institution. Matt springs her out, and together the young lovers head on a road trip. They believe their love can "cure" Casey's problems. Matt starts to wonder, though, if are they inspired or misguided.
